item.description:
Join local author Phoebe Baker Hyde for a fun and insightful workshop entitled  "Befriending Your Inner Voice." Phoebe will read a brief excerpt from her memoir The Beauty Experiment and then lead two exercises aimed at turning this psychological control mechanism into a tool of wisdom and personal empowerment. Please bring a sense of humor!

 

Phoebe has spoken about mindfulness, self-awareness and media influence with Katie Couric and UK TV host Lorraine Kelly and has been interviewed by  Radio Boston, NPR and Canada's CBC. Her essays on self, place and culture have appeared in Salon.com, The New York Times, the Los Angeles Times and the Wall Street Journal.
item.name: Befriending Your Inner Voice
